feature: Update Product Requirements with Benchmark Results
workflow_rationale: This task involves executing benchmarks, collecting data, and updating documentation - a multi-step feature completion workflow. The benchmark infrastructure is complete but has never been executed, requiring systematic data collection and documentation updates.

phases.name: Setup & Validation
phases.description: Build the workspace and verify existing tests pass before running benchmarks

subtasks.description: Build workspace in release mode to prepare for benchmarking
subtasks.notes: Build succeeded after fixing compilation errors: Error type mismatches (String vs &'static str), borrow checker issue in registry.rs, RollingExtremaOutput indexing error, and rand 0.8 API changes (random() -> gen()). Workaround: used shell script to invoke cargo.

subtasks.description: Verify existing unit tests pass before making changes
subtasks.notes: Tests executed: 579 passed, 10 failed (pre-existing NaN handling issues). Failures are in indicators/kernels modules (test_*_with_nan_in_data, EMA formula tests). These are unrelated to benchmark execution and documentation updates. No regressions from subtask-1-1 changes. Ready to proceed with phase-2 benchmarks.

phases.name: Execute Benchmark Suite
phases.description: Run all 7 experiments (E01-E07) and collect benchmark data

subtasks.description: Execute E01 baseline cost benchmarks for all 7 indicators

verification.expected: Benchmark completes, HTML report generated in target/criterion/e01_baseline/

subtasks.notes: E01 baseline benchmarks executed successfully. All 7 indicators (SMA, EMA, RSI, MACD, ATR, Bollinger, Stochastic) benchmarked at 1K, 10K, and 100K data points. O(n) complexity confirmed via scaling ratios (approximately 10× per order of magnitude). HTML reports generated in target/criterion/e01_baseline_*/. Results recorded in build-progress.txt Session 6.

subtasks.description: Execute E02 RunningStat fusion benchmarks (Welford's algorithm)

verification.expected: Benchmark completes, HTML report generated in target/criterion/e02_running_stat/

subtasks.notes: E02 RunningStat fusion benchmarks executed successfully. Fixed compilation error in bench_preallocated (borrow checker issue). Key finding: Fused Welford approach is ~2.8× SLOWER than separate passes. Decision: NO-GO for fused Welford approach. Benchmark results saved in target/criterion/e02_running_stat_*/

subtasks.description: Execute E03 EMA fusion benchmarks

verification.expected: Benchmark completes, HTML report generated in target/criterion/e03_ema_fusion/

subtasks.notes: E03 EMA fusion benchmarks completed successfully. Fixed closure lifetime issue in bench_preallocated. All benchmark groups generated HTML reports in target/criterion/e03_ema_fusion*/ directories. Key findings: Fused approaches show benefits for small EMA counts (3, 5) but separate approach is faster for larger counts (10, 20 EMAs) - interesting result suggesting the fusion overhead may not scale well.

subtasks.description: Execute E04 rolling extrema benchmarks (deque vs naive)

verification.expected: Benchmark completes, HTML report generated in target/criterion/e04_rolling_extrema/

subtasks.notes: E04 rolling extrema benchmarks executed successfully. Key findings: Naive approach faster for small periods (k<50), deque approach significantly faster for large periods (k≥50). At k=50: 4.3× speedup, at k=100: 10.6×, at k=200: 24.6×, at k=1000: 135×. GO/NO-GO decision: CONDITIONAL GO - use naive for k<50, deque for k≥50. HTML reports generated in target/criterion/e04_rolling_extrema_*/

subtasks.description: Execute E05 plan compilation overhead benchmarks

verification.expected: Benchmark completes, HTML report generated in target/criterion/e05_plan_overhead/

subtasks.notes: E05 plan overhead benchmarks executed successfully. Key findings: Plan compilation ~2.2 µs for 9 indicators, overhead <1% of execution time, break-even is IMMEDIATE. GO decision for plan infrastructure - viable for all use cases.

subtasks.description: Execute E06 memory write pattern benchmarks

verification.expected: Benchmark completes, HTML report generated in target/criterion/e06_memory_writes/

subtasks.notes: E06 memory write pattern benchmarks executed successfully. Fixed 14 compilation errors related to black_box returning references to captured variables. Benchmark results: preallocated buffers ~10-15% faster, interleaved writes 2.5x faster than sequential, direct writes outperform explicit buffering by ~20%, throughput ~900 Melem/s for single output.

subtasks.description: Execute E07 end-to-end comparison benchmarks (direct vs plan mode)

verification.expected: Benchmark completes, HTML report generated in target/criterion/e07_end_to_end/

subtasks.notes: E07 end-to-end benchmarks executed successfully. Key findings: Direct mode is FASTER than plan mode across all sizes (1.5× at 1K, 1.6× at 10K, 2.2× at 100K, 2.2× at 1M). Plan mode shows NO advantage - it's consistently slower due to overhead. EMA fusion shows minor benefit (1.17×). GO/NO-GO decision: NO-GO for plan mode architecture as currently implemented - direct mode is faster. HTML reports generated in target/criterion/e07_end_to_end_*/ directories.

phases.name: Populate E01 Baseline Report
phases.description: Extract E01 benchmark results and populate the baseline REPORT.md

subtasks.description: Extract E01 timing data from Criterion output and update REPORT.md with actual results

verification.instructions: Verify all TBD values in E01 REPORT.md are replaced with actual timing data. Verify O(n) complexity by checking 10K→100K ratios are approximately 10×.

subtasks.notes: Successfully extracted E01 timing data from Criterion output and updated REPORT.md with actual benchmark results. All 7 indicators have timing data for 1K, 10K, and 100K data sizes. O(n) complexity verified with 10K→100K ratios ranging from 8.9x to 10.6x. Status changed to COMPLETED, Decision: GO.

phases.name: Populate Kernel Experiment Reports (E02-E04)
phases.description: Extract E02-E04 benchmark results and populate kernel experiment reports with go/no-go decisions

subtasks.description: Extract E02 RunningStat fusion results and update REPORT.md with speedup percentages and go/no-go decision

verification.instructions: Verify all TBD values replaced. Verify go/no-go decision recorded based on ≥20% speedup threshold.

subtasks.notes: Populated E02 REPORT.md with benchmark results. Key findings: Fused Welford approach is 2.8× SLOWER than separate passes (NO-GO decision). All TBD values replaced with actual measurements. Committed as 9f2b993.

subtasks.description: Extract E03 EMA fusion results and update REPORT.md with speedup percentages and go/no-go decision

verification.instructions: Verify all TBD values replaced. Verify go/no-go decision recorded based on ≥15% speedup for ≥10 EMAs threshold.

subtasks.notes: Updated E03 EMA fusion REPORT.md with actual benchmark results. Key finding: NO-GO decision - EMA fusion is 30% SLOWER than separate passes for 10 EMAs at realistic data sizes. The theoretical memory bandwidth advantage is completely negated by loss of SIMD vectorization and register pressure. Commit: 19cfd92

subtasks.description: Extract E04 rolling extrema results and update REPORT.md with speedup multiples and go/no-go decision

verification.instructions: Verify all TBD values replaced. Verify go/no-go decision recorded based on ≥5× speedup at k≥50 threshold.

subtasks.notes: Extracted E04 rolling extrema benchmark results and updated REPORT.md. Key findings: Deque-based algorithm shows CONDITIONAL GO - faster for periods >= 50 (4.3-134x speedup) but slower for small periods (naive 1.4-5x faster for period <= 14). Recommended hybrid algorithm with crossover at period ~25. Decision recorded: Use naive for period < 25, deque for period >= 25.

phases.name: Populate Infrastructure Experiment Reports (E05-E06)
phases.description: Extract E05-E06 benchmark results and populate infrastructure experiment reports

subtasks.description: Extract E05 plan overhead results and update REPORT.md with break-even analysis and go/no-go decision

verification.instructions: Verify all TBD values replaced. Verify break-even point calculated. Decision recorded based on <100 executions threshold.

subtasks.notes: E05 REPORT.md updated with comprehensive benchmark results. Key findings: Plan compilation 2.2μs (500× better than 1ms target), plan reuse 0.42ns, break-even 1 execution with any fusion. Decision: CONDITIONAL GO - plan mode viable but fusion needed for benefit. All TBD values replaced.

subtasks.description: Extract E06 memory write pattern results and update REPORT.md with pattern recommendations

verification.instructions: Verify all TBD values replaced. Verify go/no-go decision recorded based on ≥10% improvement threshold.

subtasks.notes: E06 Memory Write Pattern benchmarks executed and results populated. Key findings: NO-GO for buffered/chunked writes (19-27% slower), CONDITIONAL GO for interleaved multi-output (2.53× faster). Pre-allocation saves 17-28%. Perfect linear scaling to 8 outputs. Recommendation: Use write-every-bar with pre-allocation and interleaved multi-output writes.

phases.name: Populate E07 End-to-End Report
phases.description: Extract E07 benchmark results and populate the final end-to-end comparison report with architecture recommendation

subtasks.description: Extract E07 end-to-end results and update REPORT.md with direct vs plan comparison and final architecture recommendation

verification.instructions: Verify all TBD values replaced. Verify direct vs plan speedups recorded for 7/14/21/28 indicators. Final GO/NO-GO/CONDITIONAL decision documented.

subtasks.notes: Extracted E07 end-to-end benchmark results from criterion JSON files and populated REPORT.md. Key findings: Plan mode is 1.4-2.2× SLOWER than direct mode across all configurations. Workload scaling (7/14/21/28 indicators at 10K data) shows consistent slowdown. Final decision: NO-GO for plan-based architecture. Documented root causes and recommendation to use direct mode.

phases.name: Update Experiment Summary
phases.description: Consolidate all experiment results into the SUMMARY.md document

subtasks.description: Update docs/experiments/SUMMARY.md with consolidated results and all go/no-go decisions

verification.instructions: Verify Executive Summary table updated with actual status and decisions for all 7 experiments. Verify all PENDING changed to actual outcomes.

subtasks.notes:
Updated docs/experiments/SUMMARY.md with consolidated results from all 7 experiments:

E01 Baseline: GO - O(n) complexity verified for all indicators
E02 RunningStat: NO-GO - 2.8× slower due to Welford's divisions
E03 EMA Fusion: NO-GO - 30-116% slower at scale, prevents SIMD
E04 Rolling Extrema: CONDITIONAL GO - Hybrid approach (naive k<25, deque k≥25)
E05 Plan Overhead: CONDITIONAL GO - 2.1μs compilation, but fusion fails
E06 Memory Writes: NO-GO - Buffering 19-27% slower, interleaved 2.53× faster for multi-output
E07 End-to-End: NO-GO - Plan mode 1.4-2.2× slower than direct mode

Overall recommendation: Use Direct Mode. Plan-based architecture abandoned.

phases.name: Update Product Requirements Document
phases.description: Update the PRD Section 1.3 with validated hypothesis status based on experiment results

subtasks.description: Update docs/product-requirements.md Section 1.3 hypothesis table with VALIDATED or INVALIDATED status for all 7 hypotheses

verification.instructions: Verify all 7 hypotheses (H1-H7) have status changed from PENDING VALIDATION to VALIDATED ✓ or INVALIDATED ✗. Verify supporting experiment data referenced.

subtasks.notes: Updated all 7 hypotheses (H1-H7) in Section 1.3 of docs/product-requirements.md with validated benchmark results. 4 hypotheses VALIDATED (H1, H4, H5, H6) and 3 INVALIDATED (H2, H3, H7). Added detailed validation summary with references to experiment reports E01-E07.

phases.name: Final Validation
phases.description: Verify all documentation updates are complete and consistent, tests still pass

subtasks.description: Verify no TBD values remain in any experiment reports or documentation
subtasks.notes: Verification passed: 0 TBD values remaining in experiment reports. Updated E05 REPORT.md to replace TBD reference for E06 Memory Writes with actual results (NO-GO for buffering, GO for interleaved writes).

subtasks.description: Verify existing tests still pass after all documentation changes
subtasks.notes: Test verification completed successfully. 579 tests passed, 10 failed (all pre-existing NaN handling and EMA behavior failures). No regressions from documentation updates. Test results match exactly with pre-change baseline documented in subtask-1-2.

subtasks.description: Verify consistency between REPORT.md files and SUMMARY.md decisions

verification.instructions: Cross-check that decisions in individual REPORT.md files match Executive Summary table in SUMMARY.md and hypothesis status in product-requirements.md.

subtasks.notes:
Verified consistency between all REPORT.md files, SUMMARY.md, and product-requirements.md. All decisions and hypothesis statuses are consistent:

E01: GO / H1 VALIDATED ✓
E02: NO-GO (2.8× slower) / H2 INVALIDATED ✓
E03: NO-GO (30% slower) / H3 INVALIDATED ✓
E04: CONDITIONAL GO (hybrid k≥25) / H4 VALIDATED ✓
E05: CONDITIONAL GO (2.2μs compile) / H5 VALIDATED ✓
E06: NO-GO buffering + GO interleaved / H6 VALIDATED ✓
E07: NO-GO (1.5-2.2× slower) / H7 INVALIDATED ✓

No inconsistencies found between individual experiment reports and the consolidated summary/PRD documents.

parallel_groups.reason: All depend only on phase-2-benchmarks completion, update different files with no conflicts

parallelism.speedup_estimate: Sequential execution recommended - benchmark execution is the time bottleneck (30-60 min). Report population is fast (15-30 min total).

acceptance_criteria: All REPORT.md files have actual benchmark data (no TBD values)
All go/no-go decisions documented with supporting data
Product requirements hypotheses updated with validated status
verification_strategy.reasoning: Low risk documentation task - no code changes that could break functionality. Main validation is ensuring benchmark execution succeeds and all TBD placeholders are replaced.

checks: Criterion HTML reports generated in target/criterion/
JSON data available for timing extraction
No TBD values in E01-E07 REPORT.md files
No PENDING VALIDATION in docs/product-requirements.md Section 1.3
Hypothesis H1-H7 status updated to VALIDATED or INVALIDATED

issues.description: QA agent did not update implementation_plan.json
